name: Zombie Battlefield
description:
ZOMBIE BATTLEFIELD is the most exciting mobile multiplayer zombie shooter game for your iPhone. Competing with friends, smash the zombies, SURVIVE in the ruined world. There are dozens of guns for you to choose, there must be one you loved.
TWO MODES
STORY mode and SNIPER mode, in story mode, you will challenge endless stags, save the world and protect yourself. In sniper mode, you will be a sniper and shoot the zombies in the distance with your sniper rifle.
DOZENS OF GUNS
There are many kinds of guns, the characteristics are all different, you should know what fits you best and survive.
MULTIPLAYER GAME
You can compete with your friends in the arena, let’s see who is the best shooter and the king of FPS games!
Key Features!
* Multiplayer online fps game, play with your friends for FREE!
* Next Gen 3D Graphics
* Hungry and different ZOMBIES
* Powerful bosses is coming! Get ready for the challenge!!
